comment: Tastes like traditional Canadian Rye with a shot of expresso. Goes down very smooth with a hint of vanilla.
Such a unique flavour perfectly balanced, whiskey, bold rich cold brew and then a nice hint of vanilla. Very drinkable.

Starts off as an aged Canadian whiskey with a hint of sweetness. Body has rich coffee flavour evenly mixed with whiskey, not over powering like a coffee liqueur. Finishes like a shot of espresso, making you want more.
